meaningMnemonic: Your <kanji>inferiority</kanji> has <kanji>change</kanji>d. In fact, it's getting worse and worse, changing by the minute. Each minute that goes by is another minute where you're getting worse. This is <vocabulary>deterioration</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
